website_summaries.verdict: An extremely affordable topper that provides medium-soft to medium support and a generous warranty. The best available.
pros: Includes two layers: down alternative and memory foam
cons: Dual layers increase chance of slippage during sleep

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long-term use
customer_reviews.text: This topper is great at first, but does not maintain it's structure or firmness. I am now trying to return it and dealing with the manufacturer who has yet to respond to any of my e-mails. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SA Owens-Cole

customer_reviews.title: If you want something that lasts, don't use this cover.
customer_reviews.text: One year update: This matrix cover while very plush and comfortable the first month, completely went flat. The pillow top cover is flat and won't come back to life. The Foam pad has developed a sink hole in the middle. Im not a massive person so it shouldn't be an excuse. the down cover doesn't fully cover the foam insert, and the foam insert over hangs the bed buy a noticeable margin. Would I buy this again? No. My back is not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: AllenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Trapped Mositure- Mold on Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I did sleep very comfortably with this mattress topper but one random morning It felt as if my bed was moist. I removed my sheets and the topper to find mold and moisture on my mattress from this topper. Now I have to buy an entire new mattress. This is extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C Bell

customer_reviews.title: the topping is like a Queen size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this .. both items are not the correct sizes I have a California king .. the blue gel is long enough .. just not wide enough .. the topping is like a Queen size .. smh
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but trash...
customer_reviews.text: This is no miracle pad, if there is such a thing, but it will definitely add a bit of comfort in the form of softness. As for the pillow top addition? Pretty much garbage. I dont think it adds much, if any, extra comfort and it definitely isn't going to last. Upon first wash (cold water, hang to dry), the pillow topper came out with rips in the fabric and seams all over and stuffing just pouring out. Much of it left in the lint filter. Don't expect it to survive more than maybe two or three washes in total. Spend more money on a different pillow topper or save yourself money and buy just the gel memory foam topper.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bedwell

customer_reviews.title: great for a month or so
customer_reviews.text: This was great for about a month but has already started to break down. If you sleep more then a night or two in the same spot it doesnt bounce back as well as you would want. I have to flip it around every few days to keep it usable, not fun since its not exactly easy to flip a king size piece of rubber or whatever it is. I thought about returning it but its a few days past when I can do so.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Made a firm mattress bearable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a mattress (without a pillow top against my better judgment) that ended up being waaaay to firm for my taste even after laying on it in the store. As you know, you cannot return mattresses (this one didn't have a sleep guarantee) and I was stuck with this horrifically firm mattress. I purchased this product because of the memory foam and pillow top cover. Let me tell you- it did the trick.!! The mattress is now very comfy! I'm very pleased with this product so far. Edit- and it’s not made us hot or uncomfortable while sleeping and my husband is very hot natured!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 10 years
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in 2015. I didn't know about it coming with the fabric top it didn't come with. We found it comfortable about a year and from then on the indentations got worse and worse. We finally had to remove it last week as we we're both going up with aches and pains. 10 year warranty??? Hahahaha. Trying now to figure out what to replace it with or just buy a new mattress altogether.,since the mattress we used it on was too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Whatcomgirl

customer_reviews.title: It's been 4 months now and it's holding up great. A little on the plush side
customer_reviews.text: It's been 4 months now and it's holding up great. A little on the plush side. But my wife loves it. And you know what they say... happy wife... It's a little too soft for me but I knew that going in so I still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: The GongsTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: It sleeps hot as hell!
customer_reviews.text: Had great hopes for it but its a fail, you sink in and it is hot, we are talking waking up and feeling like you are on fire hot and that is not a comfortable feeling at all. The so called memory foam is about 2 inches thick and the topper is only about an inch thick, yes its all fluffy and looks thick until you actually start sleeping on it and then it compacts down and stays that way. Another fail purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: The smell of the foam is really bad, Smells like cigar smoke
customer_reviews.text: I put plastic all around the foam to stop the smell. It wasn't soft enough, so I ordered a 3" inch from the company I used for my double bed. Now it is great. I love the topper. It is like sleeping on a giant pillow. Your company did offer to send me a new mattress, I live in a remote area. My friends flew it to me in their plane. Did not want to take a chance on a new mattress that still smelled
customer_reviews.author: colleen g.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Won’t last past 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The first night was great but every night after that has gotten progressively worse... this topper doesn’t keep its shape and if you’re like me and sleep in the same spot every night you’ll be super disappointed. For the price point, this is definitely not worth it so I’m on the hunt for another mattress topper. 3 month update: at this point the topper has completely lost its shape, and it’s only been 3 months! Super disappointed! I’m starting to wake up with neck and back problems! I’ve tried sleeping in different positions and rotating the topper, nothing helps. Invest in a better quality topper, THIS ONE IS NOT IT! Definitely not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: De'Jana' Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews. I buy lots of things as a prime member, and this is one product I wanted to review. It shows up tightly packaged and highly compressed. Read the directions before trying to unravel. You need patience because it says that it can take as much as 48 hours to fully expand. The full benefit is definately worth the wait. I am a big athletic guy wit hwide shoulders and it was not uncommon for me to wake up with my shoulders aching from sleeping on them. This is no longer the case, it does not get hot and I am having much more sound night sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Yes this topper cost a little bit of money, but the quality of sleep that you will get from it is well worth the money spent on it. I'm a back / side sleeper and there is no more pain on my hip area. It's like sleeping on a cloud, you will get a much deeper night sleep and wake up feeling refreshed. Both my wife and I aren't rolling and tossing around throughout the night, FYI yes we have a newer matters, just over 1 year old. Just bite the bullet and spend the money, you will not be disappointed in the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Not good for softer mattresses
customer_reviews.text: This topper seemed to be made of pretty good foam material. Overall, it made my bed slightly more comfortable but my mattress already had issues sinking in a bit. The topper was so soft it felt like I was sinking in even more, though, it atleast felt like it was supporting me a bit as my body was sinking in. I'd rather spend my money on firmer memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better if you have a very stiff mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is better if you have a very stiff mattress. My husband and I have a mattress that's too soft and after 3 years it started to sink in the middle (which we would then uncomfortably roll into). I bought this topper thinking it'd make our weight distribution more uniform, but it just made our soft mattress problem worse. I ended up taking the foam part off of our mattress and only using the pillow top part. That felt MUCH better! I gave the foam topper to my mom who has a very stiff futon for guests to sleep on and that ended up solving her stiff-futon problem! So, I guess: WIN-WIN!
customer_reviews.author: CNelson

customer_reviews.title: The horrid smell never went away
customer_reviews.text: The fluffy pillow top on this two-part topper is probably fine, but we never slept on it. The memory foam bottom part smelled horrid when we opened it, and the smell never went away. I aired it outside for days before putting it in a room, and even after that I couldn't stand to be in that room. I put it in a clean spot in our two-car garage while we were gone for a week, and when we came back the foam still stunk. I contacted the seller to ask about options, and they suggested that I could exchange it. I had no desire to try another one, so I just returned it through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nay

customer_reviews.title: The best $ I’ve spent
customer_reviews.text: It made me nervous, buying something like this that I couldn’t see or feel. I did a lot of research before buying. I have a bad back, and the doctor told me to have a very firm mattress. I have one, but as I age, it’s like sleeping on a board. This solved my problem. I haven’t slept so well in a decade.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sleep Number beds
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a C2 King size Sleep Number bed. We liked the adjustability of the bed, but it was not very comfortable, due to no real pillow-top padding. We went back to the Sleep number store and considered either exchanging the bed for a more expensive bed with thick pillow-top feature or purchase their 2" cool pad ($300). I researched and found this highly recommended product. This was a great investment. The bed sleeps perfect now! The product holds it shape very well, there's no odor (I did open it a few hours before installing it and let it breath). I would buy another one, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Vol Poppa

customer_reviews.title: Great night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: Bought this topper as mattress becoming uncomfortable. Love it! I would generally wake up a couple of times throughout the night, now sleep like a rock. Difficulty sleeping post menopause and this product has been awesome. Really like the cover that keeps both sections in place by completely wrapping around current mattress...highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl keeneysachs

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't go out of my way to write a review until now. In March 2020, I purchased this mattress topper hoping that it would delay my need to replace my hard, 12 yr. old mattress. From the first night I slept on my "upgraded" bed with this topper, I have felt supported by fluffy clouds cradling my body. I go to sleep wishing everyone would feel this comfortable. The product provides amazing value for the price plus it has a multi-year warranty. I think this American company takes tremendous pride in their workmanship. Thank You for providing me consistently good nights' sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great topper, should have bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering a product like this for some time, but I was hesitant about if it would really make a difference and if it would be too hot in the summer. It does make a big difference-sleep is so much better and it is not too hot. I would recommend this product to anyone. There was mild odor the first few nights (and I did let it air out for about 8 hours before putting the top layer of the topper on the foam and put the sheets on the bed), but it was not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: MonadnockGirl

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Cost!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Tuesday (speedy service! I ordered it on Sunday). The foam mat is compressed, but expands in a reasonable amount of time, and the cover is absolutely Heavenly! I'm very pleased I that I got the cover, I'm pleased period with the mattress topper! I haven't slept on it enough to give it a 5 star rating for pain relief, I am sure over the next few weeks I will notice some improvement. Haven't slept with a pillow between my knees since Tuesday night. I recommend this for anybody with back problems, or maybe even an old, worn out mattress to poof it up and save some money by not having to buy a new mattress!
customer_reviews.author: krazk8t

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised how nice it is. They didn't skimp on the topper cover, it is fluffy and has deep pockets to accommodate a deep mattress, but unfortunately it didn't cover my California King sized mattress. It was too short, but this is what came with the California King sized Gel Memory Foam cushion I ordered. Don't know if it was a mistake or not, but it sure doesn't fit. I love how it feels though, it makes me feel like going right to sleep it's so comfy. I felt like a baby on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Choicee Shopr

customer_reviews.title: WARNING. DO NOT BUY. BAD PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has a horrible strong smell. After letting it sit for 3 days before putting on my mattress. It still is unbearable. Half way through the night. I had to take it off my mattress. The odor from the topper now is on the mattress. Most likely will have to throw away my 1200k mattress. I'm not sure why this has so many good reviews. *Horrible odor. *People with allergies beware. *Quality of topper is poor. *Material is awful. * Its not durable- I'm petite, weigh 120pds and it sunk in. If I could rate this at zero. I would.
customer_reviews.author: A.S

customer_reviews.title: Off gassing is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The description is misleading. The product includes a regular mattress topper and a 4 inch raw memory foam pad which it can cover. They are not even the same size. The off gassing is hard to take and doesn't dissipate even after 3 days! It contaminates everything it touches with its' stench. I would not recommend this product at all at any price.
customer_reviews.author: sam64

customer_reviews.title: So cushy, and the down type top is so cozy!
customer_reviews.text: We have a great foam mattress but always wanted a bit more "cush" on top. This cover provides just the right amount of extra plush, plus the quilted cover is like sleeping on down! Whenever my wife and I travel, no matter how nice the accommodations, we always look forward to coming home to our bed! And at the end of the day, we climb in the bed, not on it, with an audible sigh from us both. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderlizard

customer_reviews.title: Works with sleep number beds!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for a month and love it. We have a sleep number bed and love the adjustability, but would still wake up with some pain and sleep number beds tend to heat up. This product took some bed adjustments on our part (dual chamber bed), but found a sweet spot about 10 above our normal comfort setting. This product is just the cherry on top! Comfortable, supporting, stays “cooler” longer but does overheat you eventually like any bed. Back and body feel great in the morning. Would definitely purchase again and recommend it to be purchased. Plus made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Rest Assured...
customer_reviews.text: ...this simple addition to your bed, will definitely change how you sleep. Utmost comfort, quality product, worth every penny. We LOVE it. Seriously...we have never slept better. Made all the difference in the world. There was a slight "new" odor which lasted very briefly, it never gets hot, and it has kept its shape completely. We did a lot of research on these toppers and clearly made the right choice. Would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Madley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Loved this when we first got it as an addition for our camper mattress. We slept very well, but after 3 trips in the RV each of only a couple weeks we now are trying to fight our ways out of permanent indents. (180 pounds). We rotated, switched with no improvement. We took it off and the actual mattress does not have any dips or dents. It seems the "memory" is gone. Sad, because we loved it when we first got it.
customer_reviews.author: dave o

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box we put it on our bed let it air out about 3 hours before we went to bed . We were surprised how comfortable it was . It fit the bed perfectly (Queen ) and the cover went on easily. We did notice a lingering smell But it seems less and less as time goes by. Only have had a few days so we will see how it holds up after numerous nights of use..so . so far so good .
customer_reviews.author: Cheeb

customer_reviews.title: Fixed back issue (230Pounds)
customer_reviews.text: Fixed my back issue. I bought a different sheet for it. It is less dense and allows u to fully feel the memory foam. The pad is a little too thick and stops you from actually sinking into the foam. Makes it a bit too hard. (Personal Preference).......... *6months later* - My 5 star when down to a 1. My back pains have arrived again. Not only that, worse. I can barely stand up in the morning. The gel has got hard and does not rise up much anymore. The cheap pad is solid as a brick and ads no more softness. This is an over priced product and I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pressure Point Relief
customer_reviews.text: I had an older mattress that I wasn’t quite ready to replace so did a LOT of research before deciding on this mattress pad and it did the trick for a couple months and helped me decide I definitely needed a soft mattress for my needs rather than firm I was always led to believe provided more support. Not so if you weigh less than 125lb and can’t sink into a firm mattress to get pressure point relief along your body curves! I have now purchased the softest Wink mattress but figured, what the heck! I’ll add this on top anyways for that much extra comfort! Living the marshmallow life now ;)
customer_reviews.author: run2088

customer_reviews.title: VERY MISLEADING
customer_reviews.text: The foam piece is NOT 4" thick as one might be led to believe. It is only 2" thick. This is after leaving it unrolled in a warm room for over 2 days. Apparently the other 2" is supposed to come from the cloth cover, which is ridiculous, because as soon as you lay on it, the puffiness is totally flattened, so it isn't even measurable. The weight of the foam makes it too expensive to send back, so we will just have to use it for something else.
customer_reviews.author: redninja

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Sleep Innovations Gel Memory Foam 4-inch Dual Layer Mattress Topper because my really expensive foam mattress was killing my back. We've had it 7 yrs and its starting to break down, even though every day it comes back to life it just wasn't holding it shape when we slept on it. So we've place this mattress topper on it and WOW, problem solved. Its not perfect, but now I believe I can get a few more years out of my mattress without sleeping on the couch. I recommend it and would buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Quality priduct but it’s just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this now for a little less than a year. I visited a relative who had this pad on the guest bed. It felt wonderful and I slept like a baby. So I bought one. Regular use causes sinking where you lay and it pitches me toward the middle or to the floor at other times. It feels good on the first night you flip it and then after a night or tow your back to having your own indented cocoon. It is better than nothing and it is a quality piece. Maybe I just need to lose weight. Needless to say, I’m still in search of that good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are definitely sleeping better. It's been about 2 months since we placed ...
customer_reviews.text: Our mattress began to sag after just a few years, but when I called to have it inspected as per the warranty instructions, it wasn't sagging quite enough for it to be replaced by the manufacturer. I purchased this to help solve the problem. We are definitely sleeping better. It's been about 2 months since we placed the pad and foam on our bed and there is a LOT more support than before.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Spielberg

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! This mattress topper has a horrible noxious chemical odor that will not dissipate!!! I have aired it with the windows open for many days, it still has just as strong odor as when it first arrived. I cannot use it, causes headaches assaults all senses!!! Now I cannot remove the horrible odor from my mattress and bed linens!!! In addition, it wasn’t even comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: MCL

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: We were just about to spend big $$$$ for a new mattress because my husband complains about me flopping around changing sleep positions all night. This mattress topper completely mutes that so he doesn't feel the shake anymore. I have a hip that hurts at night and it is much better with this topper as well-unexpected bonus. Super comfortable, can't say enough good things about it! I read reviews about the smell before purchasing and it did have a chemically smell that bothered me the first couple nights (I aired it out on the deck right out of the box). We don't think it sleeps hot, maybe a little warmer than our regular mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 tomboys

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but makes the covers to hot to sleep under.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little disappointing that it’s comfortable, made my hard mattress useable however I get so hot during the night that it’s a constant wrestling between getting too hot, whipping off the blanket, then I get chilly. I Haven’t had a full, sound nights sleep yet. If you’re a warm sleeper, this isn’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Foster

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I received both pieces. The quilt was flat on one side and there was a hair on it. The foam was really nice. I decided to just keep it. It was very nice to lay on, soft etc. 5 months later it still makes my bed softer but it’s not as supportive as advertised. I’m 130 pounds with some curves. My hips and shoulders still dig and are sore when sleeping in my side. I still toss and turn. I didn’t find it to be too warm to sleep on. I wouldn’t purchase again, if I could go back I’d get 4’ memory foam instead.
customer_reviews.author: crazydoglady

customer_reviews.title: Killed Our Backs!
customer_reviews.text: The gel foam is extremely firm and although after laying on it parts of your body sinks into it, it's still hard. You can easily bounce a penny off of it due to it hardness. Not something that someone with back issues should have.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been two weeks since I received this mattress topper and I must say that my back pain has been somewhat relieved and the cooling Gel actually does work. I’m not waking up in a “swamp“! My advice would be to stand the blue piece up in a room or outdoors, if possible, for at least two days however since the foam part does retain a slight odor, still after two weeks. This was a great value and when I called customer service they were exceptional! I’m very pleased that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: norma f.

customer_reviews.title: Big Difference!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old sleep number bed and can't afford a new bed at this time. I decided after a vacation to Texas visiting a family member who had this sleep topper on the bed I slept in for a week to purchase one for my bed. It has made a world of difference in my sleep. Great improvement over my old mattress! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kenn

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this foam mattress pad, it also has a white foam pad that goes on top which is also very soft, this pad is like a bottom sheet so it wraps around corners of mattress. The only thing I noticed is a musty smell. I washed the top mattress pad and sprayed the form bottom part with frebreeze and it's a little better. I'll have to wait until it gets warmer weather to air outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Too hot and tremendously overpriced
customer_reviews.text: To hot! I’m not a vary sleeper but this is way too hot. My sleeping to was soaked. It provides the added softness to the bed, however it really is too hot. The reason for the two stars is also the price. I find it very very overpriced for what you get. In particular as the seller nowhere let you know how very hot it is. Basically it can only be used during very cold winters. Also once you have unpacked it, it is impossible to repack it to return due to the vacuum packing.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! I am 7.5 months pregnant and it has completely alleviated any back pain I had prior to purchasing it. My husband is a fan as well. We have had it a little over a month and it has been a serious blessing in our house. Only giving it 4 stars because the gel pad has an overwhelming chemical smell when you open it. We let it air out for about 5 days before using it (which was disappointing) and there is no lingering smell. I have double fitted sheets, 1 that is a protector, on our bed to protect it so we hopefully won't need to watch it. HIGHLY RECOMMEND for anyone that suffers from back/hip pain.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much I bought a second set for when we go camping!! I've had the first one for a few years now and it has held up great. I've washed the white topper part a few times and have never had any issues. The combo of the memory foam and the white topper feels like I'm sleeping on a cloud--my hips and legs used to go numb and wake me up in the middle of the night. It even helped me stay comfortable through two pregnancies. It is super soft so this may not be for some looking for a firm feel.
customer_reviews.author: Rhesa B.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress pad because I was having some back pain. I was going to a Chiropractor about twice a month and having no relief, I thought maybe it was the mattress that we had that becoming a little worn. So I decided to get a mattress pad instead spending a huge amount of money on a new good mattress. I'm so glad I did!!! This cooling gel memory foam pad and topper is incredible!!! I don't wake up with back pain anymore, and it keeps me cool all night. I was a great investment!!! SO before you go drop hundreds or thousands on a good mattress, try this first. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: They always embellish the size til you get it to bed.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT ACTUALLY FOUR INCHES DEEP, IT'S ONLY TWO... I've never felt so cheated by four inches in my life! I should've known better but figured I'd take the gamble... Don't do it if you don't want to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dayjag

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: After less than 4 months, it is completely worn in meaning the added support is gone at sleep pressure points. I'll be looking for a refund though doubtful I'll be successful.
customer_reviews.author: David Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I would have posted this review sooner but I am struggling to get out of the cloud I now sleep in. I’m a little, um, plump, shall we say, and this topper really cradles me. My only criticism is that the fluffy top cannot attach to the gel. I assume that is so you can wash the fluffy part. So far, I do not find the tipped traps heat, which is good because I sleep very hot.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Evans

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because...
customer_reviews.text: I own an old queen mattress but still good, i just wanted more cushion and looking came across this memory foam topper and purchased because of the positive reviews here and thought this could be a good alternative. My only concern is that i feel it moves down the bed, i dont know if its me or what, but the cooling is a plus and the gel foam is soft. had a smell at the beginning In very sensitive to smells i just let if open in the living room and all set. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Sleep longer and more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Good buy. Extra 4” is great And the cover is soft. Night sweats were bearable. Since surgery it has been painful to sleep at night and then the Menopause night sweats start...they are worse than living in the desert, I’ve been getting up and wandering the floors Most of the night . Day one with this mattress topper slept straight through 3am woke up moments before alarm went off and body heat level was cool...And no Unbeatable pain upon sitting up. Love this topper.
customer_reviews.author: CCaldwell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cool and smells!
customer_reviews.text: This is ok for a foam pad and cover. It fit well but the smell was bad, like paint. This is also supposed to be cooling, as if. I tried sleeping with it last night and I was dieing of heat. It was so hot. The trump was 20 degrees outside and 60 inside but 100 on this pad. I ended up taking it off in the night. Between the chemical smell and the heat this was the worst night's sleep in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean J

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a mattress from Ikea. I tested it for a minute before buying, but unfortunately, sleeping on it was a whole different nightmare. It was painfully firm. I had slept on a Sleep Innovation mattress topper before, so I decided to order one and it was THE BEST DECISION I EVER MADE! The topper comes nicely packaged with a high quality pillow top cover sheet. The two combined knock me out faster than NyQuil. It is like sleeping on a dream. It has turned a god-awful mattress into a palace. I promise - this is worth all your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Brock

customer_reviews.title: Best night sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated purchasing this. I had jsut purchased a brand new mattress to help with my back pain, but yet I was still waking up in pain. I was desperate one morning so I placed the order after doing some research. It arrived quickly. Yes, it did have a smell so I let it air out for a few days while it expanded, and I slept in the recliner, it helps my back pain. I have been sleeping on this topper for awhile now and I can tell you that not once have I woke up with back pain. It has been a life-saver! I would highly recommend this topper.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This product was so uncomfortable. After about a week I started to experience severe back pain. I returned from travel and the pain immediately started again. Finally I relived the product and after one night off this thing, the pain was gone again. My wife called amazon several times and finally she had some email traffic with a customer service personnel. The person said we’ve had the cover past 30 days so we couldn’t return it. This is a terrible cover and the customer service was equally terrible. This item should be returned and full refund given. D. Jones
customer_reviews.author: Muriel

customer_reviews.title: Way too hot and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to soften up a brand new mattress that was way too firm. I did not like this topper at all. It is extremely warm and tossed and turned all night. The topper with the memory foam is just too much heat retention and it’s hard to find a comfortable position with this thing. It feels like you just sink in and can’t move. I woke up with my hips in pain. I preferred to sleep on the firm mattress then this topper. I don’t know how I’m going to return this thing cause it’s so bulky and came vacuum sealed. Go with a latex topper instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Suling

customer_reviews.title: like sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought this particular topper. I have done a lot of research and so glad I decided on this purchase, both times!! As others have said there is a chemical like scent but it dissipates within 24 hours. The topper fits our queen size bed as expected. It is like sleeping on a cloud! We wake up with no back or joint pain and with a nice set of sheets your will transform your bed into a luxurious haven to sleep on.... You will not be sorry if you decide to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: ***** Excellent ***** i cant say enough about this product i did a bunch of research before i decided on this one and im glad i did get this one im someone who has issues sleeping getting comfortable i have back hip knee issues ~~ first night in use i slept like a baby and i have been getting the best sleep i have had in a very long time ~~~ This Is A Good One !!!
customer_reviews.author: jwjs2

customer_reviews.title: Not good for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I’m a side sleeper and I don’t recommend this for side sleepers. You sink in the middle and your head and feet stay elevated and my back was hurting the next morning. I would say it would be fine for back sleepers though. The other thing is it is very oily when you touch it (I guess it’s the “gel”), and it initially has a very strong odor that was so strong my pillows and clothes smelled the next day, so be prepared to let it air out a few days before you put it on your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont by
customer_reviews.text: Product came with bedbugs. My entire body had bites. I dont want to return to infect others. Asking client to reimbuse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy! A little hot
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about purchasing this but after reading the reviews I went for it! I am so glad I did. I took off one star simply because it does make my bed warm—which will be a good thing in the winter. If you get hot easily during the night, you may want to just use the foam pad and not the down cover/topper. Comfort wise, it’s great. Our mattress was hard as a rock. Now, I sleep like a baby! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lanter

customer_reviews.title: Not for Stomach Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mattress topper but it didn't work for me. My torso is the heaviest part of my body and thus caused the foam to take the shape of a bowl. As a stomach sleeper, that put a lot of pressure on my neck and head. I woke up with pain in my neck. I tried side sleeping and the effect was reduced but still there. You'll notice the people in the picture don't use pillows--and for good reason. If they did, their neck would break. The foam also has a smell that's easy to smell while in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: Quick Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Not certain what it's like to sleep on this topper. The odor about did us in when we first rolled it out. It's now in garage, resting on tonneau cover on truck to air out. It was overpowering in our bedroom. Daughter ordered same one before we did. She had no odor. Not sure what that's all about. Hoping it goes away in a few days. Asthma issue requires we have no chemical smell. It was very pungent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: exact match
customer_reviews.text: this topper did exactly what it said it would. relieve pressure points when sleeping while not feeling like temper foam. The dual layer definitely kept me from feeling the 2" temper foam part underneath, while the foam kept me from feeling ANY pressure on my hips on our thin camper mattress. My only disappointment was that I bought this for our camper and it did not come with a bag to roll up and store for portability. Otherwise you should look no further and definitely spend the extra few bucks on the extra couple inches and dual support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical after reading some of the bad reviews. I decided to take a chance and purcahse anyway. I have been sleeping on this matterss topper for a few days now and I can say that so far the quality if my sleep is much much improved and I wake up with no back pain. I have been suffering back pain for at least 6 months because i didn't want to get a new mattress and this is a good alternative. There was no lingering smell at all and it was ready for me to sleep on in about an hour. I have already recommended this to a co worker and will recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't dump your firm mattress--just top it off with this!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry it's taken some time for this review...this topper was so comfortable, I forgot to do anything else! If you have a mattress that's on the firm side, don't fret--this is the perfect solution for you. I've since upgraded to a larger-sized bed, and several guests have slept on the bed with this topper, and everyone raves about the amazing and comfy sleep they get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My back thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: I was having major back pain for about 2 weeks and not sure why. Then I realized it could be that my mattress - which I had loved - was getting old. I didn't want to buy a new one so I looked at toppers. From the reviews it seemed like a gel topper might be the answer. Long story short: YES it was. I've only had it 2 nights and already ZERO pain! I can't believe it! It's so comfy and I think the dual toppers are a good idea. They provide support but also softness. My pets are happy, too! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonianLady

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing! I am 6 months pregnant and all my extremities go numb during my sleep. Pregnancy pillows didn’t seem to help with this problem at all. My husband was also complaining of back pain, so I figured it must be our mattress. We received the topper yesterday and slept on it last night, and we woke up two new people. It is so supportive for my growing bump and my husband said his back is relieved! We couldn’t be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Baruch

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Purchase - bad smell that won't go away
customer_reviews.text: I thought the Sleep Innovations Gel Memory Foam 4-inch Dual Layer Mattress Topper would help with my pain after sleeping each night. I can not recommend this product. 8-13-2019

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Says Me with Chronic Pain, Joint Pain, Spinal Pain,  Neuropathy, etc
customer_reviews.text: My sleep has been progressively since '91 when Cancer survival gifted me with autoimmune diseases. Sleep comfort, bed comfort is a premium as even a wrinkle or the wrong fiber feeling sometimes drives me nuts. But this Topper is like a wonderful cuddle, a soft awe. The best ever and on our new Tufts and Needle Mattress, heavenly sleep for me. Sleep and comfort that I haven't felt for years. I get more undisturbed hours and hurt less in the morning. Actually have more energy. Yes, there is a chemical smell at first, so turn on your diffuser. It goes away and you reap some good zzzz's.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for top of old mattress.

Only problem I've encountered is I must move around a lot in my sleep because the fitted sheet is always coming off in the AM. So next time I change the sheets I will have to be more careful to make sure the sheets are on tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Holy Crap YES
customer_reviews.text: LITERALLY WORTH EVERY PENNY! I had THE firmest foam mattress that I bought off amazon... after buying a cheap little 2 inch down topper, that didn’t help, after days of reading reviews and being happy with the price point, THIS THIS IS BOMB 🔥🙌🏾 So comfortable and a complete game changer. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: _itsRikki

customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old sleep number bed topper had no oomph left leaving us in discomfort at night. I had looked at this product numerous times over two years. It still isn’t a replacement for a new mattress or sleep number bed but it has improved our sleep. I have numerous joint problems and my husband was just getting uncomfortable with the old thing. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelnut Honey

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my bed.

I purchased this duo and I sleep sooooo much more comfortably now. I was just going to buy the pillow top addition but found the pair, and thought...why not? I'm extremely glad I did because this is exactly the softness I needed. These are NOT firm....they give you a sleeping on a cloud feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.text: It is rather misleading that the gel part is only 2" and (supposedly) the cloth topper adds another 2". I was thinking I was getting 4" of gel foam. I wish I'd read the description more carefully. I'd have probably chosen something else. We're using this in our camper, so I'm going to try it a few more times. I will change my review if I really really love it. I'm not sure I will really really love it, though, it does add a little extra padding.
customer_reviews.author: Josetta Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Great for Side sleepers and all kinds too! This padding is waaaaay better than i expected!

Its not too soft its not too hard! We use it on top of ikea mattress and now bed feels like 5* hotel :) Significantly reduced my shoulder pain, lower back pain and neck as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing thing on the planet!!!

Put it on your tables and countertops too, why not? It's legitimately the most amazing thing on the planet, and my wife and I will never go back to sleeping without this product. It's amazing. You will not regret it!

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a marshmallow. Super comfortable and durable.

My sister has the same combo and never wants to get out of bed it’s so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I found a bit annoying, however
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress topper after reading something about it helping to alleviate the heat build up from foam mattresses. I would wake up several times a night sweating, even though I had a heavily quilted mattress pad over my mattress. I don't believe much of what I read today in ads, but I was willing to try anything. This actually works. I no longer wake up sweating from the heat buildup. The one thing I found a bit annoying, however, was having to buy new fitted sheets with even deeper pockets than I was using before. It would be nice if the information on their ads alerted prospective buyers to that fact.
customer_reviews.author: cjp

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!  Will buy another for spare room
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a brand new bed. The mattress (alone) we bought was FIRM and $900+. We know it will eventually break in, but holy cow it was unbearable! So, my husband found this amazing dual duty cover. BEST decision by far! We love this product! We still have our support but now we have the ‘curve’ hugging pillow top AND the cooling blue addition also. It also has a 19 year warranty! Would highly recommend to all! 😊
customer_reviews.author: sinfulpuddin

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from an expensive mattress purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to purchase a new mattress since my back pain was getting unbearable. While looking at new mattresses, my father called and asked me what I was doing. I told him and he said that before making a new mattress purchase I should look at a topper. I am glad I did. customer_reviews.author: Mark Fezza

customer_reviews.title: received exactly what was advertised. very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my parent. She was having trouble with her SI joint in her back. Her statement to me was that the topper was pillowy and the underneath was firm and the two made for a good combination. I dont want to say she is hard to please but she is blind and it is hard to get things for her because she doesnt understand the consept and this was pleasing to her.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Dreams -

All toppers lend themselves to a bit of restriction, that is you do settle into the topper thereby enveloping you with comfort. Sweet dreams and Happy Holidays - Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!! The best mattress topper I've ever bought!

Will definitely buy again if needed and would without a doubt, be recommending.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed at all

My daughter has extreme scoliosis and just had major surgery to correct it and she’s been sleeping on this since she’s been back in her bed and really is enjoying it

customer_reviews.title: Great for side sleepers!

I was able to use it the night of the day it was delivered. It’s not the most ideal for sleeping on my back, but since I’m usually a side sleeper, this is pretty good. It’s been a couple years since I’ve been able to sleep through a full night, and my back pain in the morning has lessened a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ayrah Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases. Sleeping comfortably. Fit the king sized mattress perfectly. No odor at all. Laid out for 24 hours to give it time to expand, which I noticed within 2 hours. It's not so soft that one will sink into it and have difficulty turning over. It's just enough support and softness that I consider perfect for me with my back issues. I'm a side sleeper and my husband is sleeping on his stomach and are both of us are happy. Lastly...our sheet set still fits the bed well. I do recommend a set with full elastic on the fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Patty K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Instead of buying a new mattress, as mine is only 4yrs old, I decided to try this mattress topper. I can confirm that this fits perfectly on a king size bed-what I have. The cover fits perfectly also. The Gel Memory feels like a dream to sleep on, has helped with my should pain as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: susan avery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product, poorly compaced damaged foam cells.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great insert for the bed. After about a week, rolled out. I found that this cushion was so squeezed compacted into a roll that the foam cells were squashed to the point the foam was damaged. The squashed foam cells will not open up. The one half of the bed is about 2'' while the other side is a 4'' depth. Clearly the manufacture was interested in compact and did not care about the damage done to the Cushion.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!

customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness...
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress topper! I’d had neck pain for over a year, and no pillow I tried made a difference. Sleeping on my back helped some, but then I’d have back pain from my spring mattress. This topper solved both problems! My neck pain is almost entirely gone and my sleep is actually restful. ❤️ (The cats love how snuggly it is as well, and they are tougher judges than I am.)

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, itll help your back

customer_reviews.author: Lawisfun

customer_reviews.title: Quality, comfort, and great value!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is beyond expectation! It literally transformed my bed, adding potentially years before I'll have to replace my worn mattress. The plush quilted cover is the perfect compliment to the dense foam. It disburses heat, adds a lovely soft layer, and changes the total feel to that of a firm pillow top. I couldn't be more pleased with this topper.
